main event: An observer in Palo Alto, California reported seeing a red light in the sky on April 26, 1968, which eventually disappeared and was replaced by a white light.
interesting points: The sighting involved a red light that appeared low in the sky and moved south-west,The light fell straight down and disappeared after a few seconds, shortly followed by a white light at the same location,The duration of the observation was several minutes,The report suggests the object was possibly a hot air balloon,This sighting contributes to similar reports received in areas near colleges and universities.
sighted object: a red light in the sky
witness description: an observer who reported the sighting
